content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 1, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 1, Atlético de Madrid 0.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Arda Turan (Atlético de Madrid).
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Bartra replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Raúl Jiménez replaces Gabi.
Foul by Mario Suárez (Atlético de Madrid).
Xavi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Guilherme Siqueira (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Mario Mandzukic with a headed pass.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Atlético de Madrid 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Gabi (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card.
